pageTitle: Re: B&H just CANCELLED MY ORDER!!! (NEX 5RL): Sony Alpha / Nex E-mount (APS-C) Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   FYI, Sony Canada just recently got the NEX 5R with 16-50mm lens combo in stock.  For those that are close to the border you can drive up to pick one up.  Not sure if other Canadian online retailers are selling it yet.  There was also a sale in the B&M Sony store which actually discounted the bundle by $100!  Making the total $699. Feb 5, 2013 Russell Evans, In reply to
